Index.name: Thang
Index.subtitle: A passionate Software Engineer building high-performance web applications and great user experiences.

ProjectDescriptions.ecommercePlatformDesc: A full-featured e-commerce application with payments, product management, and user authentication.
ProjectDescriptions.taskManagementSystemDesc: A simple and efficient drag-and-drop task management application with real-time collaboration.
ProjectDescriptions.personalBlogDesc: A personal blogging platform built on Next.js, supporting Markdown writing and SEO optimization.
ProjectDescriptions.dataVisualizationToolDesc: An interactive data visualization tool, allowing users to upload CSV and create custom charts.

ExperienceDescriptions.softwareEngineerDesc1: Developed and maintained frontend features using React and Next.js for the core SaaS application.
ExperienceDescriptions.softwareEngineerDesc2: Optimized application performance, reducing page load times by 20% through bundle optimization and lazy loading.
ExperienceDescriptions.softwareEngineerDesc3: Worked closely with the backend team to design and integrate RESTful APIs.
ExperienceDescriptions.softwareEngineerDesc4: Participated in code reviews and maintained high code quality.
ExperienceDescriptions.webDevInternDesc1: Built new UI/UX components with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS.
ExperienceDescriptions.webDevInternDesc2: Assisted in debugging and deploying minor patches to existing systems.
ExperienceDescriptions.webDevInternDesc3: Learned and applied Agile development methodologies.

EducationTitles.bscComputerScience: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

EducationAchievements.thesis: Graduation Thesis: "Building a Product Recommendation System using Machine Learning".
EducationAchievements.codingClub: Active member of the University Programming Club.
